attributes.title: BUMMED
attributes.review: Downloaded app to try to follow the election, and it’s filled with propaganda! It is all lies and manipulation techniques. Disappointed! (But not surprised!) 👎👎👎👎👎 #NOTMYPRESIDENT

attributes.title: Misleading App
attributes.review: Thought this app was for a presidential candidate. Turns out it’s an app for a racist, ignorant, fascist fake republican.
